level.heading: Issuance of rules and regulations.
level.text: Rules and regulations proposed or issued pursuant to § 1-604.04, and amendments, shall be issued according to the provisions of § 2-505.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-27
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-124
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-124, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-603.01.
